title: Understanding Alignment
text: Consider why alignment might be important in large worksheets. Think about how users interact with the data.

title: User Experience
text: How does alignment affect the user's ability to navigate and understand the worksheet?

hintAnswer: to allow the user to easily find the worksheet
title: Choosing the Best Alignment
text: Why is left alignment preferred for titles in large worksheets?
choices: to allow the user to easily find the worksheet
